options.name: collection
options.label: Collection
options.info: Collection of records you want to evaluate if the number is between two properties

options.name: leftProperty
options.label: Left property
options.info: Left property you want to use for the between case

options.name: rightProperty
options.label: Right property
options.info: Right property you want to use for the between case

options.name: value
options.label: Value
options.info: Value that should be checked if it is in between two other values

options.name: returnProperty
options.label: Return property
options.info: Property you want to be returned

options.name: name
options.label: Name
options.info: Returns the name of the record
